General.Name: Stonehenge Inter Public Company Limited
General.Description: Stonehenge Inter Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides consulting and construction management services in Thailand. It also offers architectural and engineering design services, project management, interior design and historic site preservation, infrastructure, feasibility study, and quantity surveyor services. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

3.Name: Mr. Issarin  Suwatano
3.Title: Deputy CEO, Exec. VP of Admin. Department & Exec. Director
